channel.title: Error
channel.description:
I get this error after changing monsters drops i forgot to make a backup so it really important
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.numberformatexception: for inpput string: "1" at java.lang.numberformatexception.forinpuutstring<unknown source> at java.lang.integer.parseint <unkown source> at java.lang.integer.parseint <unkown source> at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops<npchandler.java:2583> at NPCHandler<init><npchandler.java:599> at server.main<server.java:166>

because you probably spaced something and in that file you only can use tabs instead of spaces
